#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int n;
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		long long int a[n],i,k=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
			while((a[i]-(i+1))>=0)
			{
				a[i]-=i+1;
				k++;				
			}
		}
		if(k%2==0)
		printf("BOB\n");
		else
		printf("ALICE\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
